页面导航

在线查看 pdf 文件 ​

  • npm
  • 文件路径以 http 开头，可分页查看。
bash
# 安装
npm install vue-pdf -S
js
// 引入
import pdf from "vue-pdf";

export default {
  components: {
    pdf,
  },
};
js
<div class="pdf" v-if="url.length > 0">
  <pdf
    :src="url"
    :page="currentPage"
    @loaded="loadPdfHandler"
    @progress="loadedRatio=$event"
    @num-pages="pageTotalNum=$event"
    @page-loaded="currentPage=$event"
  >
  </pdf>
  <div class="pdf-footer">
    <span @click="prePage">上一页</span>
    <span>{{currentPage}}/{{pageTotalNum}}</span>
    <span @click="nextPage">下一页</span>
  </div>
</div>

// 加载第一页
loadPdfHandler() {
  this.currentPage = 1
},
// 上一页
prePage() {
  let page = this.currentPage;
  page = page > 1 ? page - 1 : this.pageTotalNum;
  this.currentPage = page;
},
// 下一页
nextPage() {
  let page = this.currentPage;
  page = page < this.pageTotalNum ? page + 1 : 1;
  this.currentPage = page;
},
scss
.pdf {
  position: relative;
  width: 60%;
  height: 100%;
  margin: auto;
  .pdf-footer {
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    bottom: 50px;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    span {
      display: inline-block;
      margin: 0 20px;
    }
  }
}
